description:
It must be nice to have a house all to yourself, nobody around and a large stack of porn DVDs.

For this week's update, JonnyT is the lucky one that's home alone.

The lean Italian hunk starts out on the couch rubbing his cock, keeping it hidden under his dark pants until he's ready to get naked and kick back.

Not wanting to make a mess in the living room, JonnyT makes his way to the bathroom, where in the mirror, he watches himself stroke his monster cock. After playing around in front of the mirror, Jonny decides to get some fresh air and heads outside, but not before he puts on his sexy shades.

While planted on the lounge chair, JonnyT gets comfortable and reveals just how big and powerful his gorgeous cock is.

Join him as he lets loose a steamy cum shower all over his chest.

Enjoy!
title: Jonny T
